LanguageData.GR_CreateTemplateGenome.label: Create template genome
LanguageData.GR_CreateTemplateGenome.description: Create a template genome that can be used to duplicate existing genome samples.\n\nThis recipe needs corpses totalling 100 Kg of mass.
